item.title: minecraft undersea monster room
item.description: 20:07 Sunday 22 April 2018 JST I decided to recreate this reverse fishtank in Minecraft, but for some reason it is all dark when I view it from the outside. Not sure how to make the underwater view look lighter. I created the tank using a fill command, decided to expand it, and made a huge area… I think the command was something like this /fill 4000 46 -5000 4050 50 -4800 glass_blocks 0 hollow Then I carpeted the area with grass using something like this
